DataElement.preferredName: Slide Image And Invasive Cancer Portion Adequate To Complete Score Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to indicate whether or not the image quality and portion of invasive cancer is sufficient to complete scoring and reason if insufficient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Slide Image Invasive Malignant Neoplasm Part Sufficient To Complete Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic._Cancer that has spread beyond the layer of tissue in which it developed and is growing into surrounding, healthy tissues._One of the portions into which something is regarded as divided and which together constitute a whole._Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study.

PermissibleValues.value: Yes, image quality and amount of invasive cancer are sufficient
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Yes Image Quality And Invasive Malignant Neoplasm Quantity Sufficient

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Yes Image Quality And Invasive Malignant Neoplasm Quantity Sufficient
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.: Quality; a degree or grade of excellence or worth; an essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone.: An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.: Cancer that has spread beyond the layer of tissue in which it developed and is growing into surrounding, healthy tissues.: Quantity; how much there is of something that you can measure.: Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
An essential and distinguishing attribute of something or someone; a degree or grade of excellence or worth.

Cancer that has spread beyond the layer of tissue in which it developed and is growing into surrounding, healthy tissues.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.

PermissibleValues.value: No, there is insufficient invasive cancer present for scoring
